from DateTime import DateTime
 person = state_change['object']
 portal = person.getPortalObject()
 # Get required arguments
 kwargs = state_change.kwargs
 software_release_url_string = state_change.kwargs['software_release']
 software_title = kwargs["software_title"]
 software_type = "RootSoftwareInstance"
 instance_xml = kwargs["instance_xml"]
 
 sale_order_portal_type = "Sale Order"
 sale_order_line_portal_type = "Sale Order Line"
 software_instance_portal_type = "Software Instance"
 hosting_subscription_portal_type = "Hosting Subscription"
 
 # XXX Hardcoded values
 seller = portal.restrictedTraverse("organisation_module/vifib_internet")
 currency = portal.restrictedTraverse("currency_module/EUR")
 
 tag = "%s_%s_%s_inProgress" % (person.getUid(), software_type, 
 software_title)
 
 # Check if it already exists
 request_software_instance = portal.portal_catalog.getResultValue(
 portal_type=software_instance_portal_type,
 source_reference=software_type,
 title=software_title,
 )
 if (request_software_instance is None):
 hosting_subscription_reference = "HOSTSUBS-%s" % context.getPortalObject().portal_ids\
 .generateNewId(id_group='slap_hosting_subscription_reference', id_generator='uid')
 if (portal.portal_activities.countMessageWithTag(tag) > 0):
 # The software instance is already under creation but can not be fetched from catalog
 # As it is not possible to fetch informations, it is better to raise an error
 raise NotImplementedError(tag)
 else:
 
 setup_service_relative_url = portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredInstanceSetupResource()
 
 software_instance = portal.getDefaultModule(portal_type=software_instance_portal_type).newContent(
 portal_type=software_instance_portal_type,
 source_reference=software_type,
 title=software_title,
 text_content=instance_xml,
 activate_kw={'tag': tag},
 **portal.Base_getNewSoftwareInstanceCoordinate()
 )
 software_instance.portal_workflow.doActionFor(software_instance, 'validate_action')
 subscription = portal.getDefaultModule(portal_type=hosting_subscription_portal_type).newContent(
 portal_type=hosting_subscription_portal_type,
 reference=hosting_subscription_reference,
 title=software_title,
 activate_kw={'tag': tag},
 )
 
 software_release_document = context.portal_catalog.getResultValue(
 portal_type='Software Release',
 url_string=software_release_url_string)
 
 sale_order = portal.getDefaultModule(portal_type=sale_order_portal_type).newContent(
 portal_type=sale_order_portal_type,
 destination_value=person,
 destination_section_value=person,
 destination_decision_value=person,
 start_date=DateTime(),
 received_date=DateTime(),
 # XXX Hardcoded values
 source_value=seller,
 source_section_value=seller,
 price_currency_value=currency,
 activate_kw={'tag': tag},
 )
 sale_order_line = sale_order.newContent(
 portal_type=sale_order_line_portal_type,
 resource=setup_service_relative_url,
 quantity=1,
 aggregate_value_list=[software_instance, subscription, software_release_document],
 activate_kw={'tag': tag},
 )
 portal.portal_workflow.doActionFor(sale_order, "order_action")
 
 # Update Open Order
 # does this order have a client-specific Open Order
 open_order = portal.portal_catalog.getResultValue(
 default_destination_section_uid=person.getUid(),
 portal_type="Open Sale Order",	 	 
 validation_state="validated")
 if open_order is None:
 person_slap_interface_state = person.getSlapState()
 if person_slap_interface_state == 'open_order_created':
 open_order_url = context.portal_workflow.getInfoFor(
 ob=person, name='open_order_url', 
 wf_id='person_slap_interface_workflow')
 open_order = portal.restrictedTraverse(open_order_url)
 else:
 open_order = portal.open_sale_order_module.newContent(
 destination_section_uid=person.getUid(),
 destination_decision_uid=person.getUid(),
 title="ViFiB Open Order")
 person.createOpenOrder(open_order_url=open_order.getRelativeUrl())
 open_order.order()
 open_order.validate()
 
 open_order.newContent(
 portal_type="Open Sale Order Line",
 title=software_title,
 aggregate_value=subscription,
 activate_kw={'tag': tag},
 )
 
 # Find Computer partition
 # XXX Link subscript to open order
 else:
 # Update existing software instance
 request_software_instance.edit(
 text_content=instance_xml,
 activate_kw={'tag': tag},
 )
